meanings.sent1: She enjoys theatricalizing her stories with dramatic gestures.
meanings.sent2: The director is theatricalizing the play by adding colorful costumes.

meanings.definition: The act of turning something into a theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The theatricalizing of the novel brought it to life on stage.
meanings.sent2: She was in charge of the theatricalizing for the school play.
meanings.sent3: The theatricalizing of the birthday party made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The theatricalizing of the event turned it into a grand spectacle.
meanings.sent5: His talent for theatricalizing events made him a sought-after producer.
